name: Viking Chest DEMO
description:
Our game is made for the Oculus Quest. It will be a mad combination of TD and Action with rogue like elements. We have brave Vikings, brutal fairies and alcoholic magicians. And you alone against the horde of monsters! This version here is a very early prototype - not even a demo! Download, leave comments and subscribe to our social networks. Your feedback will greatly help us improve the game!

  • Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/VikingChest
  • Discord: https://discord.gg/Cn7HkvWe
  • Youtube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCtRv23A5vU2RUEevQbBoQzg

A small tutorial:

You need to throw items from the chest into the monsters so that they do not go from one portal to another.

To take the item, you need to bring the controller to the box and hold the Grip Button

To interact with UI elements, hover the controller over the corresponding UI element and press the Trigger Button

Additional Information:

Starting the game or passing the level, you get to the settlement where you can prepare for a fight with monsters. There you will meet a magician, a warrior and a blacksmith.

In the magician, you can buy items that will give the chest. Initially, it is only apples. But with each subsequent purchase of another item, the chance of getting it in the chest increases.

 In the warrior, you can replenish the hit points.

 Buy traps in the smithy. As soon as you move to the portal, you will get to the level where you need to stop the monsters that go from one portal to another. If you buy traps, then you can place them on the level.

 Each time the monster finishes its way to the second portal, you spend a hit point. If you manage to stop the monster you will get the gold. The power of monsters and the amount of gold you get for killing them grows with each level.
